curl -i http://localhost:8080
curl -i http://localhost:8080/debug/ping
curl -i http://localhost:8080/debug/info
curl -i http://localhost:8080/debug/vars



curl -i -k -X 'POST' \
-u 'api:key-masterkey' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8' \
-d '["foo", "bar", "xyz", "1", "2"]' \
http://localhost:8080/system/get-auth


curl -i -k -X 'POST' \
-u 'api:key-masterkey' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8' \
-d '["1", "2"]' \
http://localhost:8080/system/get-link-addr


{"id": "1", "id_link": 123, "id_addr": 456, "id_stat": 789, "egrpou": "20"}, nil


curl -v -k -X 'POST' \
-u 'api:key-masterkey' \
-H 'Content-Encoding: gzip' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8' \
-H 'Content-Meta: ewogICJwa2V5IjogIm1hc3RlcmtleSIsCiAgImh0YWciOiAiZ2VvYXB0LnVhIiwKICAibmFtZSI6ICLQkNC/0YLQtdC60LAgMyIsCiAgImhlYWQiOiAi0JHQhtCb0JAg0KDQntCc0JDQqNCa0JAiLAogICJhZGRyIjogItCR0L7RgNC40YHQv9C+0LvRjCDRg9C7LiDQmtC40LXQstGB0LrQuNC5INCo0LvRj9GFLCA5OCIsCiAgImNvZGUiOiAiMTIzNDU2Igp9' \
-T 'data.json.gz' \
http://localhost:8080/upload
